meanings.definition: A thick, stiff paper used for making boxes and other packaging.
meanings.sent1: The paperboard was strong enough to hold all the toys in the box.
meanings.sent2: I recycled the paperboard from the cereal box.
meanings.sent3: The paperboard box decided to take a nap after a long day of holding items.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she transformed the paperboard into a magical castle.
meanings.sent5: The paperboard packaging crinkled loudly as she unwrapped the gift.

meanings.definition: A type of cardboard made from layers of paper pressed together.
meanings.sent1: The paperboard was used to create a sturdy base for the project.
meanings.sent2: He folded the paperboard carefully to form a small box.
meanings.sent3: The paperboard decided to play hide-and-seek with the scissors.
meanings.sent4: The paperboard shield protected him from imaginary dragons in his adventure.
meanings.sent5: The paperboard layers added strength to the structure of the model.
